DRAGON_SCALE.name: Dragon Scale
DRAGON_SCALE.description: A scale that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is very tough and inflexible.

GREAT_BALL.name: Great Ball
GREAT_BALL.description: A high-performance ball with a higher catch rate than a standard Poké Ball.

HYPER_POTION.name: Hyper Potion
HYPER_POTION.description: A spray-type medicine that restores the HP of one Pokémon by {1} points.

INCENSE_ORDINARY.name: Incense
INCENSE_ORDINARY.description: Incense with a mysterious fragrance that lures wild Pokémon to your location for 30 minutes.

INCUBATOR_BASIC.name: Egg Incubator
INCUBATOR_BASIC.description: A device that incubates an Egg as you walk until it is ready to hatch. Breaks after 3 uses.

INCUBATOR_BASIC_UNLIMITED.name: Egg Incubator ∞
INCUBATOR_BASIC_UNLIMITED.description: A device that incubates an Egg as you walk until it's ready to hatch. Unlimited use!

KINGS_ROCK.name: King's Rock
KINGS_ROCK.description: A rock that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It looks like a crown.

LUCKY_EGG.name: Lucky Egg
LUCKY_EGG.description: A Lucky Egg that's filled with happiness! Earns double XP for 30 minutes.

MASTER_BALL.name: Master Ball
MASTER_BALL.description: The best Poké Ball with the ultimate level of performance. With it, you will catch any wild Pokémon without fail.

MAX_POTION.name: Max Potion
MAX_POTION.description: A spray-type medicine that completely restores all HP of a single Pokémon.

MAX_REVIVE.name: Max Revive
MAX_REVIVE.description: A medicine that can revive fainted Pokémon. It also fully restores a fainted Pokémon's maximum HP.

METAL_COAT.name: Metal Coat
METAL_COAT.description: A coating that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is a special metallic film.

NANAB_BERRY.name: Nanab Berry
NANAB_BERRY.description: Feed this to a Pokémon to calm it down, making it less erratic.

PINAP_BERRY.name: Pinap Berry
PINAP_BERRY.description: Feed this to a Pokémon to receive more Candy when you catch it.

POKE_BALL.name: Poké Ball
POKE_BALL.description: A device for catching wild Pokémon. It's thrown like a ball, comfortably encapsulating its target.

POTION.name: Potion
POTION.description: A spray-type medicine that restores the HP of one Pokémon by {1} points.

RAZZ_BERRY.name: Razz Berry
RAZZ_BERRY.description: Feed this to a Pokémon to make it easier to catch.

REVIVE.name: Revive
REVIVE.description: A medicine that can revive fainted Pokémon. It also restores half of a fainted Pokémon's maximum HP.

SPECIAL_CAMERA.name: Camera
SPECIAL_CAMERA.description: When you encounter Pokémon in the wild, you can use your camera to photograph them.

STAR_PIECE.name: Star Piece
STAR_PIECE.description: A small shard of a beautiful gem. Earns 50% more Stardust for 30 minutes.

SUN_STONE.name: Sun Stone
SUN_STONE.description: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It burns as red as the evening sun.

SUPER_POTION.name: Super Potion
SUPER_POTION.description: A spray-type medicine that restores the HP of one Pokémon by {1} points.

TROY_DISK.name: Lure Module
TROY_DISK.description: A module that attracts Pokémon to a PokéStop for 30 min. The effect benefits other people nearby.

ULTRA_BALL.name: Ultra Ball
ULTRA_BALL.description: An ultra-performance ball with a higher catch rate than a Great Ball.

UP_GRADE.name: Up-Grade
UP_GRADE.description: A transparent device that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It was produced by Silph Co.
